para.text: From among the members of each board and advisory committee, the Mayor shall designate a chairperson.
Each board and advisory committee shall determine the times and places of its meetings and shall publish notice of regular meetings at least 1 week in advance in the District of Columbia Register.
A majority of the appointed members of each board and advisory committee shall constitute a quorum.
An affirmative vote of a majority of a quorum shall be required to approve a measure before a board.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 18-26, in subsec. (c), substituted “appointed members” for “members”; and added subsec. (d).

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2(d)(2) of Health Occupations Revision General Amendment Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-146, July 28, 2009, 56 DCR 6308).
